dct_description_sm: drawn & engraved by J. Rapkin ; illustrations by H. Warren ; engraved by J.B. Allen.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
5 pictorial vignettes: [1] Tomb of Absalom -- [2] Syrian sheep -- [3] Church of the Holy Sepulchre -- [4] Nazareth -- [5] Ancient cedars of Lebanon.
Appears in Martin's Illustrated atlas, and modern history of the world.
